subject: Soccer
Demonstrations, Protests, and Riots
lead_paragraph: Tottenham’s opening match of the Premier League season against Everton on Saturday has been postponed after protests in the London neighborhood and a wave of rioting and looting across England.
snippet: Tottenham’s opening match of the Premier League season against Everton on Saturday has been postponed after protests in the London neighborhood and a wave of rioting and looting across England.
